Package javelin.controller.action

Class CastSpell

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.action.Action
      • javelin.controller.action.target.Target
        • javelin.controller.action.Fire
          • javelin.controller.action.CastSpell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ActionDescription, AiAction
    public class CastSpell
extends Fire
implements AiAction
    Spells with attack rolls are supposed to have critical hits too but for the sake of AI speed this rule is ignored.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Overrides:
        perform in class Target
